press.title: Vahlayi va Mahungu
press.contactLine: Eka swilandzelo swa vahlayi va mahungu, tihlanganisani na
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia i app ya mahungu ya vuyimeli ku sungula leyi ololisaka ku bula exikarhi ka tindzimi. Mahungu ma tswaleka hi ku hela (end-to-end) ku suka eku sunguleni, naswona ku hundzuluxela ku seketeriwa 100+ tindzimi hi nkarhi lowu fanaka. Vatirhisi va nga veka mahungu lama nyamalalaka, ku vona ku hlayiwa hi ku rhandza, naswona va ringanyeta exikarhi ka tichayini. Yi kumeka eka iOS, Android, na webu.
press.assetsSubtitle: Tilogo, swikandziyiso, ni swifaniso swa chigadzirwa.
press.scanTip: Eka desikithopo? Skana hi foni ku kuma app.

careers.title: Misebenzi
careers.intro: Hi ntlawa lowutsongo lowu akiweke musamisi wa misava hinkwayo, wa vuyimeli. Loko u khathalela ku tswalwa, ku koteka ka vanhu hinkwavo ku tirhisa, ni UX leyi tsakisaka, hi rhandza ku twa ka wena.
careers.openRoles: Swikimu leswi pfulekeke: Injhiniri (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Chigadzirwa, Mpfuno.

about.title: Hi ta Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia i musamisi wo hlayisa, wa tindzimi to tala hi ku tswaleka ku suka eku sunguleni, ku hundzuluxela hi ku hatlisa, ni mifuwo/vhidiyo. Xikongomelo xa hina xo olova: ku pfuna vanhu ku hlanganisa‚Äîhi vumunhu, hi vuyimeli, ni exikarhi ka tindzimi.

values.privacy: <bold>Vuyimeli ku sungula:</bold> Ku tswaleka ka E2E ku suka eku sunguleni.
values.access: <bold>Ku fikelela ka hinkwavo:</bold> Hundzuluxela 100+ tindzimi hi otomatiki.
values.control: <bold>Vulawuri:</bold> Mahungu lama nyamalalaka & ku vona ku hlayiwa swi hi hilaha u swi rhandzaka.
values.privacy_aria: Vuyimeli ku sungula: E2E ku suka eku sunguleni.
values.access_aria: Ku fikelela ka hinkwavo: Hundzuluxela 100+ tindzimi.
values.control_aria: Vulawuri: Mahungu lama nyamalalaka na ku vona ku hlayiwa i swa ku rhandza.

about.howDescription: Mahungu ma tswaleka eka xichayini xa wena u nga si ma rhumela. Ku hundzuluxela, bhekhapu, ni ku ringanyeta swi akiwe ku hunguta leswi seva ya hina yi nga swi vonaka.

advertise.title: Dyondzisa na Chatforia
advertise.description: Fikelela vatirhisi lava hlanganaka swinene hi tiphoso leti nga ni ndzhuti. Hi na tibhenara leti vonakaka swinene, vusirheleri, ni tisoponsara. Va Premium a va voni matsundzuxo.

adsense.withPubId: Hi tirhisa Google AdSense sweswi. Loko u lava ku hi targeta hi Google Ads, sebenzisa ‚Äòpublisher ID‚Äô {{pubId}} u kombela managed placement eka tibulo leti hansi. Tidili ta ‚Äòdirect‚Äô ti kona ‚Äî sebenzisa fomo.
adsense.noPubId: Hi tirhisa Google AdSense sweswi. Tidili ta ‚Äòdirect‚Äô na tona ti kona ‚Äî sebenzisa fomo leyi hansi.

advertise.noPlacements: Ku hava tiplacement leti hlayisiweke. Engetela eka ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Ku nghena ngopfu ni nkarhi wo tala eka UI ya ku bula
why.brandSafe: Tifomati leti sirhelelekeke; ku lawuriwa ka ntolovelo wa ku humelela
why.sponsoredMoments: Tindzhuti ta sponsorship (xik. ‚ÄúStart a Chat‚Äù modal) ti kona
why.deals: Tidili ta ‚Äòdirect‚Äô kumbe hi AdSense/Google Ads

gettingStarted.title: Ku Sungula
gettingStarted.subtitle: U ya sungula na Chatforia? Xiletelo lexi xi ku kombisa leswi swa nkoka leswaku u sungula hi ku hatlisa.

alert.text: Xiletelo lexi xi ta kula hi leswi hi tlhontlhora switirhisiwa leswintshwa. Loko ku ri na leswi nga khomiwanga, hi tivise hi

section1.title: 1) Vumba akhawunti ya wena
section1.loginText: hi akhawunti ya wena leyi eka yona.

section2.title: 2) Sungula ku bula
section2.item1: Tumbuluxa DM kumbe Ntlawa u rhumela hungu ro sungula.
section2.item2: Tirhisa ku hundzuluxela hi ku hatlisa ku bula exikarhi ka 100+ tindzimi.
section2.item3: Ringeta mahungu lama nyamalalaka ni ku vona ku hlayiwa eka Phurofayili ‚Üí Vuyimeli.

section3.title: 3) Ya ehenhla
section3.item1Part2: pheji (Plus = ku hava tisavhere, Premium = matimba hinkwawo).
section3.item2Part1: Hlanganisa tichayini tin‚Äôwana u veka bhekhapu leyi tswalekeke eka

account.q: Ndzi vumba njhani kumbe ndzi vuyisela akhawunti ya mina?
account.a: Dawuniloda app kumbe tirhisa webu, pfuka ‚ÄúVumba akhawunti‚Äù, tiyisekisa imeyili/foni. Ku vuyisela, tirhisa ‚ÄúRivalele phasiwedi‚Äù.

privacy.q: Xana mahungu ma tswaleka ku suka eku sunguleni?
privacy.a: Ina. Mahungu na mifuwo swi tswaleka ku suka eku sunguleni. I wena na muamukeri ntsena lava nga swi hlayaka.

translate.q: Ku hundzuluxela hi ku hatlisa ku tirha njhani?
translate.a: Vhumbelerisa ‚ÄúHundzuluxela hi otomatiki‚Äù eka Swilungiselelo ‚Üí Xikombiso & Ririmi. Hi hundzuluxela eka xichayini laha swi seketelaka, kumbi hi API leyi sirhelelekeke hi metadata leyi nga tsariwiki.

contact.a: Hi fikeleri eka support@chatforia.com. Engetela swikandziyiso ni nomboro ya app ya wena.

contact.title: Hi Tihlanganise
contact.successMsg: Inku‚Äîntlawa wa hina wu ta hlamula hi imeyili.
contact.errorSend: A swi kotekangi ku rhumela. Hi rhumele eka support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Pholisi leyi ya Vuyimeli yi hlamusela leswaku Chatforia (‚Äúhina‚Äù, ‚Äúhina‚Äù) yi hlengeleta, yi tirhisa, ni ku avelana mahungu njhani loko u tirhisa ti-app na switirhisiwa swa hina. Hi akiwe Chatforia ku hunguta datha leyi hi nga yi vona.

infoWeCollect.title: Mahungu lawa hi ma hlengeletaka
infoWeCollect.account: Mahungu ya akhawunti (xik., imeyili/foni) ku tumbuluxa no hlayisa akhawunti ya wena.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Vundzeni lebyi tswalekeke (mahungu/mifuwo) byi tswaleka ku suka eku sunguleni; a hi byi hlayi.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Tinxaka ta xihoxo/ku tirhisa ku antswisa no dzunisa ntirho.

howWeUse.title: Hi ma tirhisa njhani mahungu
howWeUse.provide: Ku nyika ni ku hlayisa mutsamisi (auth, ku lemuka spam/ku chava).
howWeUse.improve: Ku antswisa switirhisiwa (vukona bya ku hundzuluxela, ku tshembeka).

sharing.title: Ku avelana
sharing.body: A hi xitisi datha ya vun‚Äôwana. Hi nga avelana datha leyitsongo na varimi (xik., push, analytics) hi swirhangana swo rhanga.

rights.title: Timfanelo ta wena
rights.body: Hi ku ya hi ndhawu ya wena (xik., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), u nga kombela ku hlayisa, ku lulamisa, ku susa, kumbe ku huma eka mimfumo yin'wana. Tihlanganisa: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ku hlayisa datha & vuhlayiseki
retention.body: Hi hlayisa ntsena leswi lavekaka ku tirhisa mutsamisi naswona hi tirhisa swiyenge swa vuhlayiseki swa indasitiri. Vundzeni bya E2E a hi byi tswaluli.

children.title: Vana
children.body: Chatforia a yi kongomisiwi eka vana va le hansi ka 13 (kumbe tanihi leswi nawu wa ndhawu ya wena wu lavaka).

changes.title: Ku cinca
changes.body: Hi ta veka swin‚Äôwe laha kutani hi pfuxeta ‚ÄúKu pfuxetiwile ro hetelela‚Äù.

intro.body: Hi ku tirhisa Chatforia u pfumela Mimfungho leyi. Loko u nga pfumeli, u nga tirhisi mutsamisi.

accounts.title: Tia khawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nyika mahungu ya ntiyiso u hlayisa switirhisiwa swa wena hi vuhlayiseki.
accounts.itemResponsibility: U na nkongomiso wa leswi endlekaka eka akhawunti ya wena.

acceptableUse.title: Ku Tirhisa ko Amukeleka
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ku hava leswi nga enawini, ku biha, kumbe ku tlulisa timfanelo; ku hava spam kumbe ku tirhisa ka otomatiki ko biha.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Hi nga yimisa/khansela loko ku tluriwa mimfumo.

yourContent.title: Vundzeni bya wena
yourContent.body: U hlayisa timfanelo eka vundzeni bya wena. U hi nyika timfanelo leti lavekaka ku endla mutsamisi (xik., ku rhumela, ku hlayisa, ku hundzuluxela).

disclaimer.title: Swikombelo & ku rhanga nawu
disclaimer.body: Mutsamisi wu nyikiwa ‚Äúku fana ni leswi nga kona‚Äù handle ka swikombelo. Hi ya hi Nawu, Chatforia a yi na ntirho wa ku biha kumbe ku landzela leswi nga kongomi hakunene.

changes.title: Ku cinca
changes.body: Hi nga pfuxeta mimfumo; ku ya emahlweni ku tirhisa endzhaku ka ku pfuxeta swi vula ku pfumela.

doNotSell.title: U Nga Xitisi kumbe U Nga Avelani Mahungu ya Mina Ya Vutshamo
doNotSell.body: Chatforia a yi xitisi mahungu ya vun‚Äôwana. Vatsari va California va nga tlhela va rhumela swikombelo hi CPRA va tirhisa buthini leyi hansi.

cookies.title: Swilungiselelo swa Tikhukhi
cookies.body: Chatforia yi tirhisa tikhukhi letintsongo (xik., seshini, vuhlayiseki). A hi tirhisi tikhukhi ta switiviso ta vun‚Äôwana. Lawula tikhukhi hi swilungiselelo swa browser ya wena.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: A swi kotekangi ku panga xiyimo xa nomboro ya foni.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: A ku nyikiwanga nomboro. Hlawula hi area code ku sungula ku tsendeka.

startChatModal.searchPrompt: Tsala vito ra mudluti kumbe foni u pfuxa Secha.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Tsalwa ra foni/imeyili ri ta kumeka loko u ri hlayisa tani hi khonta.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Swi tsandzekile ku sungula ku bula na lava hlawuriweke.
startChatModal.firstMessageOptional: Hungu ro sungula (hi ku lava kambe ro pfuna)

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Xitirhisiwa lexi xi lava plani ya Premium.

aiSettings.title: Swilungiselelo swa AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Lawula ku hundzuluxela, tinhundzuluxo leti pfunaka, na ForiaBot auto-responses.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Hundzuluxela mahungu lama nghenaka hi otomatiki
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Kombisa ya masungulo na ku hundzuluxela swin‚Äôwe
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Rhumela mahungu ya mahetelelo lama amukeriweke (lama basiwaka) eka AI ku kumisisa tinhundzuluxo to hatlisa.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Fihla marito lama hombolokeke eka swihlawulekisi swa AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Loko yi ri ‚Äòon‚Äô, tinhundzuluxo leti humaka eka AI ti ta va ti na marito lama hombolokeke ma fiketiwile
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Vhumbelerisa mhindzulo yo tihumelela loko ndzi ri bizy
aiSettings.activeUntilOptional: Yi tirha ku fika (hi ku lava)
aiSettings.saveFailed: Swi tsandzekile ku hlayisa swilaveko swa AI
aiSettings.translateTagged: Loko ku ri na @translated kumbe ku tagiwa
aiSettings.modeDm: Tibulo ta munhu na munhu ntsena

accessibilitySettings.title: Ku Koteka Ku Tirhisa & Matsundzuxo
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Tindlela to endla Chatforia yi olova ku yi tirhisa handle ka mimpfumawulo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Yi sungula hi sayizi ya ntolovelo. Engetela loko u rhandza tsalwa lerikulu eka swilungiselelo swa ku koteka ku tirhisa.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Swikombiso swa mahungu & mifuwo
Kombisa tibhenara ni ku nyanyula theraitili leswaku u nga tshiki nchumu.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vhayibirheta loko ku ri ni mahungu lamantsha (loko swi seketelwa)
Hlohlometa ku vhayibirheta ka xichayini hi matsundzuxo.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Vhenekisa xikirini eka mufuwi lowu nghenaka
Ku vheneka loku kombraka loko mufuwi wu huwelela.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Hundzuluxela hi otomatiki tinotsi ta rito
Ngetela tsalwa eka mahungu ya mpfumawulo lawa u ma amukelaka.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Swikombiso swa mahlo eka mahungu & mifuwo
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Kombisa tibhenara ni ku nyanyula theraitili leswaku u nga tshiki nchumu.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vhayibirheta eka mahungu lamantsha (loko swi seketelwa)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Hlohlometa ku vhayibirheta ka xichayini hi matsundzuxo.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Vhenekisa xikirini eka mufuwi lowu nghenaka
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Ku vheneka loku kombraka loko mufuwi wu huwelela.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Hlayisa ntsena ‚Äòciphertext‚Äô eka seva. Swi timela AI/Translate ni ku vona eka moderation.

login.title: Amukela nakambe
login.subtitle: Nghena eka akhawunti ya wena ya Chatforia
login.googleUnavailable: Ku nghena hi Google a ku kumeki
login.appleUnavailable: Ku nghena hi Apple a ku kumeki
login.ssoUnavailable: Single-sign-on a yi kumeki sweswi. Tirhisa vito ra mudluti & phasiwedi.

error.invalid: Vito ra mudluti kumbe phasiwedi a swi lulamanga
error.unprocessable: Xikombelo a xi lulamanga. Languta vito ra mudluti/imeyili na phasiwedi.
error.deviceLimit: Mfungho wa tichayini wu fikeleriwile eka Free. Huma eka xichayini xin‚Äôwana kumbe apelela ku Premium ku hlanganisa tin‚Äôwani.
